TopicTitle: 'Center of view' shifting + Service Bay failure

Articles.Content:
Hello Kerbonauts,

After many successful missions with small vessels (< 40 parts), i built a slightly bigger vessel ((74 parts) ... maybe the size matters). - Now two bugs are messing up the KSP experience :

  • I can't close the small service bay. - Right click, but the context text just shows 'Toggle', no 'Close doors' (or so),  neither being in the VAB nor inFlight.
  • Inflight i observed a strange behavior with the 'center of view', with every speed change (staging or changing throttle), the vessel moves more and more to the right corner of the screen. When reaching Kerbins Orbit the 'center of view' is far off the vessel, you have to zoom out until the vessel seems to be a dust particle.

 

Can anyone share this experience, or is there a known solution to it ?

Hi @Gemini0915, are you using any mods?  I have only heard of mods causing this.

Also, please see the Need Support sticky thread, we'll need your game logs and probably your craft file/save as well.

Ouch ! ... sorry, i see now that i'm in the wrong corner, i have installed the almighty MechJeb.

Please delete this anomaly here
